This is a plot I made to see if the output gets saved in the same folder as the post's `.Rmarkdown` file and gets included correctly:

```{r testplot}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mpg, aes(x = year, y = cty, color = cyl)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```
